name: Slimetroid (FriesNosauce)
description:
This is our first game jam(brackey's jam #5), the level is a bit short, hope you will like the game. (level is inspired by Metroid)

Tools

Made with Unity, Aseprite for pixel art, sfxr for sound effects, Ecrett music for BGM, sprites for 2 enemies are from Unity asset store(Sunny Land Forest Assets)
